name: Digital marketing manager
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. Responsible for the promotion of Internet resources and online media, increase the exposure and visibility of the company's official website or mobile Internet products such as malls, SMM, and apps, and use online promotion methods to increase its traffic.
2. Fully responsible for the company's brand SEO, able to formulate a comprehensive search engine optimization strategy according to the company's strategic development requirements, and be responsible for the SEO effect.
3. Develop a digital marketing strategy, work with internal collaborations, and establish a digital marketing plan.
4. Formulate DM ad delivery strategy and track and analyze the delivery effect, including Google, YouTube, Yandex, Facebook, etc.
5. Responsible for the comprehensive indicators of the product's pv, pr, visits, search engine indexing and public opinion monitoring of related content.
6. Develop and optimize social platform operation strategies, and be responsible for planning and executing SMM events

Requirements:

  • Fully understand the value of DM communication, which is extremely mobile Internet gene.
  • Active thinking, creative, and able to produce targeted digital marketing programs.
  • Possess basic marketing knowledge, have independent thinking about Internet marketing methods, and be familiar with the laws of social media communication;
  • Have management experience and be able to lead a digital marketing team of more than 5 people;
  • 3+ years' relevant experience (Mobile Industry is preferred);
  • Experience in using customer-market research, data analysis, and customer insights
  • Knowledge of online marketing channels
  • Strong command of the English language (Upper-Intermediate or above)

We offer:

  • opportunity for professional growth and career development;
  • competitive salary
  • warm family atmosphere in a friendly team
  • work in a new comfortable office a minute from the metro station (Novyye Cheremushki)
